steps.description: Prepare cornbread according to package directions, cool, and crumble. Then set aside.
Prepare salad dressing according to package directions.

Layer a large bowl with half each of cornbread, lettuce, and the next 6 ingredients: spoon half of dressing evenly over top. Repeat layers with remaining ingredients and dressing. Cover and chill at least 2 hours.

title: Dianne's Southwestern Cornbread Salad
introduction: ![Dianne's Southwestern Cornbread Salad](/pix/diannes-cornbread-salad.webp) Dianne's Southwestern Cornbread Salad is as colorful as it is delicious. - ⏲️ Prep time: 30 min - 🍳 Cook time: 15 min - 🍽️ Servings: 10-12 - 🥶 Chill: 2 hrs
ingredients_source_text: - 1 (6-ounce) package Mexican cornbread mix - 1 (1-ounce) envelope buttermilk Ranch salad dressing mix - 1 small head romaine lettuce, shredded - 2 large tomatoes, chopped - 1 (15-ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained - 1 (8-ounce) package shredded Mexican four-cheese blend - 6 bacon slices, cooked and crumbled - 5 green onions, chopped
directions_source_text: 1. **Prepare** cornbread according to package directions, cool, and crumble. Then set aside. 2. **Prepare** salad dressing according to package directions. 3. **Layer** a large bowl with half each of cornbread, lettuce, and the next 6 ingredients: spoon half of dressing evenly over top. Repeat layers with remaining ingredients and dressing. Cover and chill at least 2 hours.
